Html:
How can I do to associate a G2Dscrollbar to a text (in a G2DLabel)?

I created a G2Dscrollbar by G2DScrollbar scroll=new G2DScrollbar, then I could not associate it with a large text...

any advice?

It is not supported. Goblin's 2D GUI's are really just for simple tasks and debugging since it mostly focuses on 3D and AR aspects. 

If you want to have nice 2D GUI's, there are several packages available for XNA and you should be able to incorporate them with Goblin.

Ohan
